--- In gladiator@y..., "oldschool518" <johnnyoldschool@e...> wrote:
> i'd say at LEAST level 300. check out whichever one of Tevildo's 
> levels that is where the guys are like level 9 bazillion.

Hehe.  I am willing to bet none of the opponents is Tevildo's set has 
experience level higher than 20 because I would have remembered 
fighting such a dangerous opponent.  Experience level 20 opponents can 
topple a 100% legitimate team with lowest experience level of 64 (No 
comment about which scenario I am talking about).  'Ten Inept Mages' 
uses invulnerability potions.

Anyways, the plan is for the god to be a cleric and the opponent to be 
an archmage.
